welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Alsager, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We hope you have a fantastic stay and discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving mainly long-haul and holiday flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for seasonal and holiday flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
